Dear IA-Team,

due to some negative customer feedback I need to implement a=
 feature
to manually "retire" queues via the WebUI. 
(I presume this would =
be the quickest way to stop crawling a host.)

The basic thing I'd intend t=
o do would be something like:

String classKey =3D curi.getClassKey();
sync=
hronized (allQueues) {
  wq =3D (WorkQueue)allQueues.get(classKey);
  retir=
eQueue(wq);
}

But there is one thing I'm not sure yet - how do I assure th=
e queue
doesn't get unretired on a kickUpdate() ?

Regards
  Olaf Freyer
